user_instruction: 'Respond to Emily'"'"'s request for alumni highlights (emily@brightfutures.org). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Follow-up: Alumni Highlights for Bright Futures Newsletter  

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well!

Could you please send over a few standout alumni success stories for our upcoming Bright Futures Foundation newsletter? Specifically, I’m looking for:

• Name, graduation year, and current role/organization  
• A brief summary of their recent achievements or community impact  
• Any relevant photos, quotes, or links we can include (with permissions noted)

If it’s easier, feel free to pull details from the “Alumni Success Stories” folder in your Gmail or the “Alumni Spotlight” database in Notion—whatever’s most convenient.

When possible, I’d love to have the material by next Friday (June 14) so we can finalize the layout.

Thanks so much for your help, John. Let me know if you have any questions or need additional context.

Best regards,  
Emily Carter  
Community Outreach Manager  
Bright Futures Foundation  
emily@brightfutures.org

final_output:
